snippet: Unrelenting snow has left some elderly and infirm in the towns just outside New York City unable to get out of their homes, and treacherous roads have made it hard to reach them.
abstract: Unrelenting snow has left some elderly and infirm in Westchester County towns, just outside New York City, unable to get out of their homes, and treacherous roads have made it hard for families and home health care professionals to reach them.

byline.original: By JOSEPH BERGER and LISA W. FODERARO

lead_paragraph: Unrelenting snow has left some elderly and infirm in the towns just outside New York City unable to get out of their homes, and treacherous roads have made it hard to reach them.

headline.main: For Snowbound Elderly in Suburbs, a Season of Isolation
headline.print_headline: For Snowbound Elderly and Infirm in Suburbs, This Winter Is a Season of Isolation
